infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to find cafes near you and show your position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to find cafes near you and show your position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to find cafes near you and show your position on the map.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to find cafes near you and show your position on the map.
